value.title: Tumblr Posts (based on "Main Tumblr Feed")
value.description:
Given a Tumblr username, pulls recent posts through the API instead of RSS to detect post type, then reformats for correct RSS display and presents the result.  Useful if wanting to include ${type} as a part of a regex statement in the feed (ie: title = "${title} [tumblr:${type}]").

Intented as a drag-n-drop component; just "Favorite" then include in your mashup and enter your username.

Based on "Marre's tumblr".

items.description:
blurredeyevision:

Driving around lake Arenal.  This is the first of my images from Costa Rica.  This was shot at sunset while driving around Lake Arenal.  The Arenal area is exactly what I expected a Caribbean country to be like: plants everywhere, great temperatures, rapidly changing weather and crazy driving.  


(Mar 31)

items.title: Install Kanso with Ease
items.description:
I started to get into CouchDB, then ran right into some trouble with CouchApp. I hope to have better luck with Kanso, and realized when installing that I already simplified the first two steps. Hopefully this helps some others out.

items.title: FBI Wants to Monitor Social Media
items.description:
Surprise, surprise. 

But seriously, I love requirement #2:  

Automated search of national news, local news, and social media networks. Examples include but are not limited to Fox News, CNN, MSNBC…

So based on their examples, the priorities of the FBI are, in this order, to: 

  1. Learn that their president is actually a secret Muslim/Hindu/Witch Doctor who started the “Anonymous” hacking group in the hopes to speed the fall of capitalism and the rise of a grand socialistic republic. 
  2. Know what the Kardashians are doing at this exact moment. 
  3. Fall asleep.

Good plan.

(Jan 27)

items.description:
Drink every time you can’t understand Bane!

justinrampage:

Batman: Arkham Party (Batman: Arkham City Shot Set)

This drink was created for an article in The Guardian.

Ingredients:
Midori
Vodka
Crushed Ice
Blue Curacao
Sambuca
Cranberry Juice
Rum 
popping Candy
Fresh Mint 
Sugar Syrup
Blackcurrant Coulis (You can buy this in bottles or jars)
Champagne

Directions:
“This shot set sees some of Gotham’s most dastardly villains taking on the Dark Knight. For The Riddler, pour 20ml of Midori down the inside of glass, then add 5ml of vodka over a spoon. For a Mr Freeze, crush some ice and pour it into your shot glass, followed by 10ml of Blue Curacao and 10ml of Sambuca. Your Joker is made from 15ml Blue Curacao, cranberry juice and rum with a topping of popping candy (“You’ll need to stir it up with a straw to get the colour,” says James). Then we have a Poison Ivy, grown from 15ml of rum, a fresh mint leaf (or a dash crème de menth if you prefer) and sugar syrup. Finally, create your Batman/Bruce Wayne shooter with 5ml of blackcurrant coulis and champagne.”

Drink created by James Dance / Loading Bar (Facebook) (Twitter)

Via: thedrunkenmoogle


(Jan 13)
items.title: Photo:
items.photo-caption:
Drink every time you can’t understand Bane!
